## ğŸ“¦ Features

* ğŸ”— Generate QR codes for any valid link

---

## ğŸ“¥ How to Use

1. Paste your link in the input box.
2. Click **"Generate QR Code"** to see the preview.
3. Click **"Download"** to save the QR code image.
